summary: The implementation successfully covers most requirements with a complete multi-page website featuring navigation, all six pages (Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Pricing, Contact), contact form with backend storage, blue/white color palette, responsive design, and modern animations. However, several requirements have incomplete or missing implementations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section headline must be exactly 'We Build Powerful Digital Solutions'
missing_requirements.reason: The Home.tsx file was truncated and does not show the hero section content, so verification of the exact headline text is not possible

missing_requirements.requirement: CTA button must be labeled exactly 'Get a Free Consultation'
missing_requirements.reason: The Home.tsx file was truncated before showing the hero CTA button text, preventing verification of the exact label

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer must be consistent across all pages
missing_requirements.reason: While Footer component exists and is used in Layout, the truncated files prevent verification that the footer displays identically across all pages

missing_requirements.requirement: Contact form must include email and WhatsApp contact options displayed on the page
missing_requirements.reason: Contact.tsx shows email and WhatsApp contact information but ContactForm.tsx was truncated, preventing verification that these options are properly displayed alongside the form

missing_requirements.requirement: Design must use blue and white color palette exclusively throughout all pages
missing_requirements.reason: The index.css shows OKLCH color values without clear blue/white specification, and frontend/index.css uses grayscale values (lightness 0-1, chroma 0). No explicit blue hue values (around 250-270 degrees) are consistently defined as primary colors

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement smooth scroll behavior across all pages
missing_requirements.reason: While frontend/src/index.css includes 'scroll-behavior: smooth', this CSS is not included in the build. The actual global styles in frontend/index.css do not include smooth scroll implementation

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement SEO optimization with meta tags, headings, and alt text
missing_requirements.reason: While frontend/index.html includes some SEO meta tags, the truncated page files prevent verification that individual pages have proper meta tags, semantic headings, and alt text for images

hallucinated_features.reason: Both CSS files include comprehensive dark mode color schemes, but dark mode was not requested in the BuildRequest

useInternetIdentity.ts and related authentication hooks are implemented, but the BuildRequest explicitly stated in non-goals: 'Do not integrate third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity' - suggesting II should not be implemented unless specifically needed, which it was not
The backend implements public query methods to retrieve submissions, but REQ-13 only requires storing submissions for review, not implementing public retrieval APIs
Footer includes 'Built with Caffeine.ai' attribution with UTM tracking, which was not requested in the BuildRequest
